name: Uppercut
description:
A game about punching things!

Move left and right with arrow keys, uppercut with Z.

Punching enemies will send them flying and break the blocks above them.

The goal is to get the highest score possible by collecting gems. Punch gems in the air to increase their score value!

A high score table is not yet implemented, but feel free to post yours in the comments!

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam
